[Al such psalmes of Dauid as T. Sternehold didde in his life time draw into English metre] Whole book of psalms. 1533 Sternhold, Thomas, d. 1549. Hopkins, John, d. 1570.
[84+] p.
Imprinted at London in Fletestrete ouer against the Cundit, at the signe of the Sunne, by Edwarde Whitchurche, [London] : [1533?]
T.p. lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Running title: Psalmes of Dauid in metre. Imprint from colophon. Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A-G H⁴. Imperfect: lacks signature C₂ and all before signature C₁. Identified as STC 2421 at reel 108:3. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

Imperfect: lacks signature C₂ and all before signature C₁. Identified as STC 2421 at reel 108:3. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
